name: Cat Boss
description:
You're the Cat Boss in the Cat office and you need to keep your worker-cats at their desks to keep your company profitable. Drag the cats back to their desks when they try to slack off and you'll earn enough money to expand your office!

Herding cats has never been the same!

Made in 2 days for the June 2019 Guildford gamejam.

Credits:

Art - Alice Hughes

Audio - James Tocher (Jamestocher.itch.io, www.cerberusaudio.co.uk)

Programming - Chris Kemp (kurisrk.itch.io)
